Class WarPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck
      • WarPlayer

  • public class WarPlayer
extends Deck
    WarPlayer class that extends the Deck object. WarPlayer adds a boolean holding if the object is human and a warPile that holds a temporary stack of cards used during the card game War.
    Author:
    StevenCasey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman)
      Default constructor that only takes bIsHuman and then uses super() to initalize a standard 52 card deck.
      WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman, java.util.ArrayList<Card> newDeck)
      Alt Constructor that accepts bIsHuman and an ArrayList of Card Objects.
      WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman, Deck aDeck)
      Alt Constructor that accepts bIsHuman and a Deck object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToWarPile(Card aCard)
      Adds a singular Card object to the beginning of the player's WarPile.
      void dumpWarPiles(WarPlayer aPlayer)
      Takes a second Player's warPile, combines it with current player's warPile, shuffles the new stack, and appends it to the current player's main deck.
      Card getTopOfWarPile()
      Returns the first Card object in the player's warPile.
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getWarPile() 
      boolean isHuman() 

      • Methods inherited from class Deck

        addToDeck, addToDeck, deckSize, getCards, numCards, pullCard, setDeck, shuffle, splitDeck, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WarPlayer

        public WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman)
        Default constructor that only takes bIsHuman and then uses super() to initalize a standard 52 card deck.
        Parameters:
        bIsHuman - is WarPlayer a human or computer

      • WarPlayer

        public WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman,
                 Deck aDeck)
        Alt Constructor that accepts bIsHuman and a Deck object. calls super(aDeck) to assign aDeck's cards to the new WarPlayer and sets bIsHuman value.
        Parameters:
        bIsHuman - is WarPlayer a human or computer
        aDeck - Deck object

      • WarPlayer

        public WarPlayer(boolean bIsHuman,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Card> newDeck)
        Alt Constructor that accepts bIsHuman and an ArrayList of Card Objects. Calls super(newDeck) to assign input ArrayList of Cards to new deck's list of cards. Also sets bIsHuman value.
        Parameters:
        bIsHuman - is WarPlayer a human or computer
        newDeck - ArrayList of Card objects

    • Method Detail

      • addToWarPile

        public void addToWarPile(Card aCard)
        Adds a singular Card object to the beginning of the player's WarPile.
        Parameters:
        aCard - Card Object

      • getWarPile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getWarPile()

      • dumpWarPiles

        public void dumpWarPiles(WarPlayer aPlayer)
        Takes a second Player's warPile, combines it with current player's warPile, shuffles the new stack, and appends it to the current player's main deck. Clear's both player's warPile decks to ensure no duplicate cards.
        Parameters:
        aPlayer - WarPlayer Object

      • isHuman

        public boolean isHuman()

      • getTopOfWarPile

        public Card getTopOfWarPile()
        Returns the first Card object in the player's warPile.
        Returns:
        Card Object
